author: Hiatt Woods
title: How location data can help track and stop the spread of COVID-19
description:
• Contact tracing has become a major tactic around the world in tracking and containing the spread of the COVID-19 coronavirus.
  • While effective in other countries, the United States has yet to deploy contact tracing at scale. 
  • Locatio…
